1.0.name: wordpress/paradise
1.0.description: Paradise is a great all-purpose clean and minimalistic theme. It uses superfish menu effects, built-in pagination for post pages and an elegant layout. Add your own personal flair by uploading a custom header or background image. The customization options include theme settings page, custom background, custom header.
